# kaleido_platform_account_access_policy (Resource)

Grant a User Group or Application access to account resources.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `application_id` (String) Application ID. Specify either group_id or application_id
- `group_id` (String) User Group ID. Specify either group_id or application_id
- `policy` (String) Policy. rego policy document

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
